price: او كه ته مو ټينـګ كړى نه واى نو نږدې وه چې د دوى لور ته لږ وركوږ شوى واى.
arabic: وَلَوۡلَآ أَن ثَبَّتۡنَٰكَ لَقَدۡ كِدتَّ تَرۡكَنُ إِلَيۡهِمۡ شَيۡـٔٗا قَلِيلًا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: walawlā an thabbatnāka laqad kidtta tarkanu ilayhim shayan qalīlan
